articles.title: Serena Williams 'Almost Died' During One of the Biggest Moments of Her Life - Sportscasting
articles.description: On the court, Serena Williams is capable of beating any opponent with ease. In her personal life, though, the tennis star beat a tougher opponent: death.
articles.content: When you’re talking about tennis, it’s tough to get any bigger than Serena Williams. During her time on the court, she’s done just about everything possible; that includes winning 23 Grand Slam singl… [+3778 chars]
